author: peruzzim
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the issue reported by @Dr15Jones in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28118#pullrequestreview-304259916

Should be backported to 102X and 106X.

#### PR validation:

Tested on one file, it runs. The code change is pretty minimal.
title: Fix electron PFCandidates RefVector usage in MuonFSRProducer
